item.description:
November 9th meeting Wings program. " Mountain Flying".

There's lots of mountains around these parts. Doing a cross country? When was the last time you looked into the Mountain flying techniques?

Been up to Mt Washington? It's beautiful!

Thanks to our two Jim's, Jim Adams and Jim Bisson, for putting this together for us.

OSH Raffle Tickets will be on sale.... We'll pick up some discussions on our upcoming events as well..

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup WINGS
